Asset Pipeline
About

rmKit has a basic asset pipeline that will package assets for the app into the binary itself.

Usage

To use the asset pipeline, set `ASSET_DIR=asset_dir/` in the app's Makefile, like so:

EXE=demo.exe
FILES=main.cpy
ASSET_DIR=assets/

include ../actions.make

Then run wake assets to generate an assets.h file. Each file that was in ${ASSET_DIR} will now be available in the assets:: namespace, along with its size.
